comment: She is super nice and gives great feedback. The class just feels like a lot of busy work (especially at the end of the semester). It is very doable though. Sometimes she takes a while to return grades.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor B is such a wonderful professor! I took her for this LDRS3000 course and loved it so much I decided to take her LDRS3400 course! She genuinely cares about her students and their grades. She gives clear instructions, as well as clear feedback when grading to help you understand the mistakes made. She is the best!

I am currently taking INTS4498 and Prof. B is one of the best teachers I have had at KSU. The class is organized so much better than my first attempt at it with another professor. Modules are every 2 weeks.  Quizzes aren't easy but thankfully they are open book.  Prof. B gives great feedback and really sets you up to succeed!

SUCH a good professor. I made a 97 in her course this semester. No exams, had a quiz every other week that was open note, & lockdown browser was never used. Discussions are lengthy but are also every other week, they alternate with the quizzes. Very easy to get in contact with. I definitely recommend this professor!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took Prof Boettler for Service in Leadership for a 7 week course. It is in no sense an easy A but if you are looking to knock out a class in 7 weeks I wouldn't hesitate to take this class! The key to success in an online class is organization and she keeps D2L very organized. Some weird group projects, short DBs, and no tests until the easy final

Not an Easy A. Get ready to read because her tests are on several chapters. Using the book as you take the test wont help you, neither will quizlet. I got a B so it is possible to pass its just the tests were hard.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Love this professor. She will give you a bit of work but its pretty simple stuff. She is very sweet and fun. No one wants to take freshman seminar. Thats a given. But its really not bad. Id recommend this professor highly
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Mrs. Boettler was an okay professor. She definitely took this class more serious than most seminar professors. She grades really tough, so choose another professor if you have the opportunity. Not the worse, but definitely not the best.

In one word: ANNOYING. She's VERY passionate, which means she takes this class way too seriously. 2 involved groups projects, 5 daily grades, 2 essays, a midterm and final. The midterm and final require lots of studying... (Memorizing the undergrad catalog)!! Takes her sweet time to put grades in and MANDATORY attendance. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Very passionate about her job. Cares about the education of her students. Always trying to inquire deeper about issues. Assignments are pretty easy. She tends to go overboard compared to other professors in the same subject when it comes to materials. Once again VERY passionate about her job.
She is a very fun teacher who really cares about her jobs. The only thing is get ready to work you do alot (most are completetion). But when they arnt they are essays or projects.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Fair share of group projects and plenty extra credit opportunities.
Professor B is really passionate about this class for reasons I don't know why, but she's a sweet lady. She wants to help you and be there for you so if you're struggling she can definetly help!

Professor B is a great professor. She counts attendance, but honestly going to class isn't too bad. She focuses a lot on societal issues and is always trying to get students to talk about their opinions and views. She's super nice and not strict at all. Group projects and rarely any homework. Easy A.

I took this class, and found it horribly pointless. Although it is necessary, I believe that this is not the teacher to take it with. Although she is very lenient, and kind to most, she seems to have a very snarky and sassy undertone. I find her to give a lot of busy work and speak to students as if they are 4. I don't recommend.

She's a great person who really understands and relates to her students. She is very lenient and willing to work with you on deadlines. Don't skip class, don't do the bare minimum and you will pass. This course could be torture with a bad professor, so I highly recommend Professor B. Overall, one of my favorite professors.

She is such a nice person but does take this class way too seriously. Always wants class participation and for u to take notes. Felt like assignments were pointless, made group projects too difficult like it was hard to understand what she wanted from them. Tests can be confusing as well. Lttle extra credit, always pushed back deadlines for us.

Prof. Boettler is a very sweet woman, but her class is pretty hard. Read, read, read the rubrics. I can't stress that enough. Be prepared to have a lot expected of you as well. If a lot of the class doesn't have something done, she will move the deadline to a later date. She rarely, if at all, responds to her emails so be sure to ask in person.

Great person, bad teacher.  She knows what she wants from you, but class is awkward. You'll spend the whole semester on one project that is way to complicated. I'd take a different First Year Seminar if I could go back.

Okay, she's an awesome lady. She's really nice and helpful, but this class is taken very seriously. It's a really hard class. She grades things like the class is your major, not like its a freshman seminar. Definitely not an easy A. She is helpful though and energetic, but don't take if you want an easy A. You can only miss 3 classes all semester.
I enjoyed this class with Professor B. I loved her energy and she seemed very excited about teaching the class.  If you keep up with the assignments, you should do well.

Prof. B is super nice. She gives out a little extra credit, not much. She is a great person, but she takes this class waaaaay to seriously. It's a lot of work for a grade booster class. I would take her over any other freshman seminar teacher any day though.

She is super nice and relatively helpful. She is always really reasonable about outstanding circumstances. However, she takes the class way too seriously. It's supposed to be a GPA booster. Definitely not!
GREAT PROFESSOR! I would take her again any day! She is so nice and does whatever she can to help you. Took her KSU 2290 class and loved it. Overall she does a great job!

Ms. B is really enthusiastic about class & nice to students. All of the assignments are pretty easy & she explains what she wants really well. Her grading is a little picky on some assignments, but not too bad. She wants everyone to do well & gives a little extra credit.3 tests including the final & midterm that are not hard if you study a little.

Dr. Boettler is an amazing professor who will bend over backwards to help you! Her class is very clear. All you have to do is show up and turn in all of the work on time and you will get an A. She loves to help people so do not be afraid to ask. She is one of the most helpful teachers at Kennesaw. I would take another class from her!

Professor Boettler is a VERY good professor. Her class is by no means hard and the people who say it is must not put in the minimum effort needed to make an A in her class. Yes there is busy work but they are easy assignments like handing in the syllabus.Overall great teacher, very helpful and acts like one of us!

I agree this prof takes the class way too seriously. Useless information, tons of busy work, and mandatory attendance. She seems nice enough on the surface but I didn't care for her personality or her teaching style. Take someone else. You'll have less busy work and more time to focus on the real college classes.
Pretty easy class, she's straight forward. The community engagement project she does is A LOT of work. you HAVE to come to class or you're going to fail

She is an awesome teacher but the class sucks and she requires attendance. There is a lot of boring and pointless homework. I personally think this should be a 1 or 2 credit class so that students can focus more on important classes. On the other hand she is an awesome teacher and turns an otherwise terrible class to a somewhat interesting class.
Seems like I already knew most of the stuff, but I still learned something from her. Great teacher. A lot of pointless work, but it is an easy A.

pointless class and although the teacher is very nice and helpful, she takes the class WAY to seriously and gives a TON of busy work and papers.(not hard) Most of my friends with other teachers for this class watched movies and stuff, so i'd recommend going with someone else.

She is awesome!! This class is mandatory, and she is the best to take it with! She takes attendance but if she didnt, then no one would show up. The class is pointless and boring but Ms. B makes it less boring! She is extremely understanding and helpful!

Professor B is awesome! She is so forgiving when it comes to homework.  She really loves her job, so she is always excited about teaching.  She is great with facts about the campus and the resources they offer here.  It is impossible to fail.

She is a great teacher and is really cool. She offers lots of extra help and is lenient on homeworks and partial credit. You have to take this class and she's the best one to take it with definately! Prof. B offered lots of chances for extra credit and assigns medium homework and projects.

She is a really cool person and a pretty good teacher. This class is awful though. There just is no way around it. You are going to be bored regardless of who you have for a teacher. I had some fun though. She has a unique personality.

She was a great teacher and had to make it mandatory or no one would have gone. She made the time you had to learn fun and enjoyable.She doesnt grade too hard and she tells you EXACTLY what she wants. She is understanding and a fabulous professor!I wish she taught other courses.I disliked the AKS but loved her.TAKE HER CLASS!!!!!!!!!!!

I really like this teacher. She is very fun and has a great personality. The course taught me a lot about the college life and how to go about it. I think she made my first semester a lot easier. I recomend her highly.

I agree. This class is a waste of credit hours (and $$) that don't even count toward degree requirements. Her attendance is mandatory and excruciating. I found this prof to be boring and full of useless information that she found interesting.

She requires you to purchase the KSU book which isnt resellable and usually costs around forty dollars. We used it five times for a grade though so you had to have the book! Attendance is graded because no one wants to go. Several dropped the class due to their absences because they were unable to get an A. This class was LAME! Waste of time and $!
Great teacher with an awesome attitude. Moderate homework and assignments, but nothing that a college student can't handle. An overall pleasure.
This class can be summed up by the phrase "waste of time". really easy grade, so no worries there but do not take this class if you want to learn anything, because you wont.
The class is stupid, but she makes it almost entertaining. She definitely cares about students and wants to help. Great woman, wretched class.

great teacher,definetly helpful for first year college students. has a genuine care for the students. here main focus is to get your college career and life started. loves for students to think outside the box.

Her style of teaching is fair, rather boring class. Class rarely gets out early. Midterm is impossible (60% average). Grades the paper rather strict. Lots of busy work.Community engagement project at the end (lots of work). Not an easy A. you really have to apply yourself which is hard to do when the material covered sucks!

I really loved this class. Mrs. Lynn is a really great teacher and mentor to have your first semester at Kennesaw. There are assignments and tests, but they won't kill you. I met a lot of really cool people in my class, and there were plenty of group activies to help you connect. I highly recommend this professor!
she was boring and condescending. would not recommend. attendence is mandatory if you want a good grade but be prepared to be bored.
I absolutely loved this class. She is such a helpful teacher. She really cares about her students and makes her classroom environment very open and fun!!
VERY BORING CLASS BUT NOT TO HARD.

this class was a joke. the teacher made it more uncomfortable then necissary, grading somewhat meticulously on such anal things as "knowing our learning styles," and "memorization" which really, duh? it was a condescending course, and easy to not get an A in just due to not caring.

the class is boring and she can be boring as well but she's really nice and will help you out with whatever you need.  if you don't care about getting 10 pts. each time you come to class, then you can skip class.
Great teacher, very flexible and fun! take her

AMAZING teacher! always willing to help you out. The semester is clearly outlined in the syllabus and she is very flexible with due dates. There is alot of work but it is all easy just somewhat time consuming. Easy A as long as you attend class most of the time. She offers extra credit throughout the semester. TAKE HER!

Really clear teacher.  Everything is laid out in the syllabus.  Attendance policy, miss no more than four.  An EASY A class as long as you do your work, but the work is far from hard.  Boring, but it will definitely help out your GPA.

The KSU 1101 class is so boring to me. She makes it easy though. She is a great teacher, very caring, happy, interested in the students, and flexible. She really enjoys what she does and that is evident. Definatly get her if you can. It's an easy A anyways.
bored out of my mind!

Great professor. Very encouraging.  She gave several assignments but they were simple.  Just do the work and you will get a good grade. Oh and no tests, only a couple quizzes (2 or 3). The final was easy also.
Great Teacher! Easy class! What more can you ask for. Do the work and you have yourself an A. Best teacher I've had in a while.
AWESOME PROFESSOR. SHE MAKES THIS REQUIRED CLASS BEARABLE. VERY NICE, INTERESTING AND FUN! I WOULD TAKE ANY COURSE SHE TEACHES!
easy, fun, and helpful. Very flexible, will even change deadlines if she can tell class is stressed about an assignment.
She's a very nice person! Just do all the work and you'll make an A! She gives extra credit! You may have class @ IHOP sometimes! It's a cool and fun class!
Very easy.  Nice lady, just turn in all of your work!
IF YOU DO THE WORK YOU GET AN A. EASY AS THAT
She Cool, just turn in all the work and you easily get an A
She is a very nice teacher, I would definitly recomend her class. Very clear, and helpful. You have to turn in very easy assignments, I got an A in the class be sure you turn in and the homework.
